metadata.title: CVE-2016-9858 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. With a crafted request parametervalue it is possible to initiate a denial of service attack in savedsearches feature. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions(prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
